named-query.name: findAllRelaitionByResource
named-query.query: select distinct m from IdentityResourceAuthorization m where m.resource.id=?

named-query.name: findAuthorizationByRole
named-query.query: select auth from IdentityResourceAuthorization auth join auth.identity role where role.id=? and auth.abolishDate>?

named-query.name: findAuthorizationByResourceIdentifier
named-query.query: select auth.identity.id from IdentityResourceAuthorization auth where auth.resource.identifier=? and auth.abolishDate>?
